snippet: American tennis officials hired Kathy Rinaldi and reimagined the job as full time with the goal of re-energizing the nation’s top young players to get on board....
abstract: United States Tennis Assn names Kathy Rinaldi, former player and key figure in USTA's player development program, captain of America's Fed Cup team; aims to revive squad's fortunes in international team competition by persuading country's top players to participate and providing them with sufficient resources.
lead_paragraph: American tennis officials hired Kathy Rinaldi and reimagined the job as full time with the goal of re-energizing the nation’s top young players to get on board.

headline.main: Mired in 16-Year Title Drought, U.S. Fed Cup Team Turns to a New Captain
headline.print_headline: Remodeling the U.S. Fed Cup Team
